author: Agence France-Presse
title: Spain eases lockdown as toll falls to 517
description: Some factory and construction staff are set to return to work under strict safety guidelines
content:
Spain reopened parts of its COVID-19-stricken economy on Monday as slowing death tolls in some of the worst-hit countries boosted hopes that the curve may be starting to flatten and lockdown restrictions could soon be eased.
